What are the reserve requirements for a currency to be included in the list returned by `getcurrencyconverters`?
To be included in the list, a currency must have at least 1000 VRSC in reserve and a VRSC reserve ratio of more than 10%.

### `getcurrencyconverters "currency1" "currency2" ... | 'json object'`
Retrieves all currencies that have at least 1000 VRSC in reserve, are >10% VRSC reserve ratio, and have all listed currencies as reserves
